record.id: field.name="open.behavior" and file.name="cm3rcatphase" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: open.behavior
record.file.name: cm3rcatphase

detail.detail: Prompt for Open (allow deferral): If selected (set to true), prompts the user to open this next phase in a sequence of phases. If the user does not open the subsequent phase, the phase is put into a deferred status.
Open - prompt for update: If selected (set to true), automatically starts the next phase in a sequence of phases and displays it in update mode.
Open phase and exit (no deferral): If selected (set to true), automatically starts the next phase in a sequence and returns the user to the previous window.
